content: I'm excited to plan the treasure hunt and the pirate-themed food. For the treasure chest, I think I'll include some gold coins, small toys, and snacks. I'll also create a treasure map to lead the kids to the treasure chest. By the way, speaking of family, I've been trying to reconnect with my cousins, who I haven't seen in ages. We've been planning a family game night for weeks, and it's finally happening next weekend. Do you have any suggestions for some fun, interactive games that are suitable for both kids and adults?
